sn21.12:1: Sāvatthiyaṁ vihārati. Atha kho dve bhikkhū sahāyakā āyasmato mahākappinassa saddhivihārino yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu. Addasā kho bhagavā te bhikkhū dūratova āgacchante. Disvāna bhikkhū āmantesi: "passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, ete bhikkhū sahāyake āgacchante kappinassa saddhivihārino"ti?
sn21.12:2: Idamavoca bhagavā. Idaṁ vatvāna sugato athāparaṁ etadavoca satthā:
sn21.12:4: Suvinītā kappinena,dhamme ariyappavedite;Dhārenti antimaṁ dehaṁ,jetvā māraṁ savāhinin"ti.
sn21.12:5: Kolito upatisso ca,ghaṭo cāpi pavuccati;Navo sujāto bhaddi ca,visākho nando tisso ca;Theranāmo ca kappino,sahāyena ca dvādasāti.
